text: "That little beast Robbie Munyard spent six months ashore while Pericles was refit - in the dockyard and now that she's ready for sea he goes sick. Just because he's an Honourable he can do what he likes. Anyway, why pick on you to succeed him?" John didn't answer. There was no point in sharing his discomfort with Peggy.
